data.title: Retirement tax breaks benefit higher earners, leaving middle-class savers behind, report finds
data.description: Tax breaks designed to boost retirement savings may primarily benefit higher earners, leaving middle-class workers behind, according to a report.

data.title: Biden to announce new executive actions to spur domestic solar, clean energy development
data.description: President Joe Biden will announce new executive actions to spur more domestic production of solar panels and clean energy technology on Monday, a source familiar with the actions told CNN.

data.title: Opinion: Gen Zers, don't believe the love-work hype
data.description: In the past month, millions of college students have been graduating and entering the American workforce. Steve Jobs' well-known advice to the Stanford class of 2005, "find what you love ... and love what you do," has now become the accepted gospel among the college-educated workforce.

data.title: Sell Micron as economic headwinds dent demand for PCs and smartphones, Piper Sandler says
data.description: Micron Technology's exposure to consumer markets could prove problematic in the near term, according to Piper Sandler.

data.title: The energy in nuclear waste could power the U.S. for 100 years, but the technology was never commercialized
data.description: The technology to turn nuclear waste into energy, known as a nuclear fast reactor, has existed for decades. Now, it's getting a second look.

data.title: Self-driving car companies' first step to making money isn't robotaxis
data.description: While governments may be wary of driverless cars, people want to buy the technology and companies want to cash in.

data.title: Teacher resigns after LGBTQ+ flashcards reportedly found in class
data.description: Teacher resigns after LGBTQ+ flashcards reportedly found in class

data.title: Ford CEO expects consolidation among automakers and suppliers as EV transition fuels costs
data.description: Farley said the massive amounts of capital needed to invest in the technologies will force smaller companies to be acquired.

data.title: Advice for the class of 2022: What new graduates need to know about money and jobs
data.description: Transitioning from school to the adult world of work and money isn't necessarily easy.

data.title: Binance raises $500 million fund to invest in 'Web3' as crypto slides into bear market
data.description: Web3 aims to create a new version of the internet based on blockchain technology.
